question:
Identify the type of expenses and their total value approved for 'October Meeting' event.
total value refers to SUM(cost); 'October Meeting' is an event name;
query: SELECT T1.type, SUM(T3.cost) FROM event AS T1 INNER JOIN budget AS T2 ON T1.event_id = T2.link_to_event INNER JOIN expense AS T3 ON T2.budget_id = T3.link_to_budget WHERE T1.event_name = 'October Meeting' GROUP BY T1.type
